item.title: hannah add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: hannah add a quote by Graham Chapman
item.description: "I don't want to talk to you no more, you empty headed animal food trough wiper. I fart in your general direction. Your mother was a hamster and your father smelt of elderberries." -- Graham Chapman

item.title: hannah add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "We cannot change the cards we are dealt, just how we play the hand." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: hannah add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Experience is what you get when you didn't get what you wanted. And experience is often the most valuable thing you have to offer." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: hannah add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "My colleague told me: "It took a long time, but I finally figured it out. When it comes to men who are romantically interested in you, it's really simple. Just ignore everything they say and only pay attention to what they do." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: hannah add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Wait long enough and people will surprise and impress. When you're pissed off at someone and you're angry at them, you just haven't given them enough time. Just give them a little more time and they almost always will impress you." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: hannah add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Its important to have specific dreams. Dream Big. Dream without fear." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: hannah add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "Time is all you have and you may find one day that you have less than you think." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: hannah add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: hannah add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: hannah add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: hannah add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: hannah add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: hannah add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: hannah add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: hannah add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: hannah add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: hannah add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "This above all: to thine own self be true, And it must follow, as the night the day, Thou canst not then be false to any man." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: hannah add a quote by Gerard Way
item.description: "If you look in the mirror and don't like what you see, you can find out first hand what it's like to be me." -- Gerard Way

item.title: hannah add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "I accept chaos, I'm not sure whether it accepts me." -- Bob Dylan

item.title: hannah add a quote by Marthe Troly-Curtin
item.description: "Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time." -- Marthe Troly-Curtin

item.title: hannah add a quote by Marlene Dietrich
item.description: "It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter." -- Marlene Dietrich

item.title: hannah add a quote by Anne Frank
item.description: "Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy." -- Anne Frank
